product_name: Sanuk Donny Chill Shoes - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Sporting iconic Sanuk style and colorful uppers, the Sanuk Donny Chill Shoes for boys will keep your child's feet cozy with warm fuzzy faux shearling linings. Heavy-duty cotton canvas uppers have seams that are meant to fray, giving them that well-worn look. Loose-fitting uppers allow feet to move and spread for natural shock absorption. Plush polyester shearling linings keep the chill at bay with great insulating and moisture-wicking performance. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) treatment deters odors. EVA midsoles and outsoles on the Sanuk Donny Chill Shoes offer ample cushioning and a stable platform to walk on; soles are rubberized EVA for durability. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Sporting iconic Sanuk style and colorful uppers, the Sanuk Donny Chill Shoes for boys will keep your child's feet cozy with warm fuzzy faux shearling linings.
